page.title: 13My House -A
page.content:
by Susanna Starbuck My house is a semi-detached four bedroomed house. It has three floors, a separate bathroom and toilet. It has a front garden that is 15ft. by 12ft. The back garden is 100ft. by 20ft. The house also has a dining room, alounge and a kitchen.
by Tarquin Mills My house is a little old workman's terraced cottage. Built in 1888, it has a tiny garden. The original kitchen was so small that the outside fuel room and outside toilet were used to enlarge the kitchen.There are two living rooms. My bedroom and my mother's bedroom have four ceilings:- one of polystyrene tiles,a war ceiling, another ceiling and the loft floor. The stairs are steep. In a new house they would be illegal.
